properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued February 7 at 2:04PM PST until February 9 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest seas 12 to 15 feet at 15 seconds tonight,
becoming 10 to 14 feet at 11 seconds by Saturday night. Winds
becoming north 20 to 25 kt Saturday afternoon.

* WHERE...Small craft advisory conditions will impact all areas,
with very steep and hazardous seas developing beyond 5 nm from
shore Saturday afternoon.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory is in effect from 1 AM Saturday
to 4 PM PST Sunday, with a Hazardous Seas Warning in effect from
4 PM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY
